net.nemerosa.ontrack.repository

Interface AccountGroupMappingRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountGroupMappingJdbcRepository

    public interface AccountGroupMappingRepository
    Generic mapping for the account groups.

    • Method Detail

      • getGroups

        java.util.Collection<AccountGroup> getGroups(java.lang.String mapping,
                                             java.lang.String mappedName)
        For the given mapping type, collects the AccountGroup which are associated with the mappedName name.
        Parameters:
        mapping - Mapping type, for example: "ldap"
        mappedName - Mapping name, for example: "Administrator"
        Returns:
        List of mapped groups, can be empty, but not null

      • getMappings

        java.util.List<AccountGroupMapping> getMappings(java.lang.String mapping)
        For the given mapping type, collects the mappings.
        Parameters:
        mapping - Mapping type, for example: "ldap"
        Returns:
        List of mappings, can be empty, but not null

      • newMapping

        AccountGroupMapping newMapping(java.lang.String mapping,
                               AccountGroupMappingInput input)
        Creates a new mapping
        Parameters:
        mapping - Mapping type, for example: "ldap"
        input - Input data for the mapping
        Returns:
        Created mapping

      • getMapping

        AccountGroupMapping getMapping(ID id)
        Gets a mapping by its ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the mapping
        Returns:
        Mapping

      • updateMapping

        AccountGroupMapping updateMapping(ID id,
                                  AccountGroupMappingInput input)
        Updates a mapping
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the mapping
        input - Input data for the mapping
        Returns:
        Updated mapping

      • deleteMapping

        Ack deleteMapping(ID id)
        Deletes a mapping
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the mapping
        Returns:
        Acknowledgment

      • getMappingsForGroup

        java.util.List<AccountGroupMapping> getMappingsForGroup(AccountGroup group)
        Gets the list of mappings for a given group.
        Parameters:
        group - Group to get the mappings to
        Returns:
        List of mappings (never null)
